@VenkateshSatagopan Actually you are correct, I was looking at different images. Your attached images should be RGB, confirmed using scipy, opencv and PIL. When running the above code snippet with the following line

image_decoded = tf.image.decode_bmp(image_string, channels = 3)

I didn't encounter the error you mentioned from my end. Could you verify that the other images had no issues with this code snippet?
